name: tezbridge-crypto
description: The TezBridge crypto library for Tezos blockchain in JavaScript with Flow type system

scripts.test: flow && parcel build test/index.js --target node -o test.js && node dist/test.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf .cache && flow && parcel build src/index.js --target node && NODE_ENV=browser parcel build src/index.js --target browser -o browser.js

author: catsigma
